doctor.name: Dr. A K M Kamruzzaman
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. A K M Kamruzzaman is a dedicated Neonatal and Child Disease Specialist in Sylhet, holding an MBBS from Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College, FCPS in Pediatrics, and PGPN in Child Nutrition. He serves as a Consultant in the Department of Paediatrics at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Kamruzzaman provides expert care for diseases like neonatal jaundice, pneumonia, asthma, childhood infections, malnutrition, developmental disorders, allergies, and other pediatric conditions. He sees patients at Popular Medical Center, New Medical Road, Kajolshah, Sylhet – 3100, from 5pm to 9pm, closed on Friday.
